questions.question: What is the main learning outcome of this session on Introduction to Database Design?
questions.explanation: The main learning outcome is: Design database schemas

questions.question: The facilitation technique used in this session is JIGSAW.
questions.explanation: Yes, the facilitation technique is JIGSAW

questions.question: Based on the session objectives, define clearly a term introduction to database design as used in design database schemas
questions.sample_answer: Students should be able to define clearly a term introduction to database design as used in design database schemas

questions.question: Based on the session objectives, select properly 2 methods related to entity-relationship modeling
questions.sample_answer: Students should be able to select properly 2 methods related to entity-relationship modeling
